name: Carry Me Home
content: Be my voice when I can't speak
And carry me  carry me  carry me
When you're standing in the room
Turn it up  lift it up  wake me up
叫醒我卖给我你的梦想
I know I might regret it
But I don't give a damn
All I want is a soothing hand
Make it pop  burn it up  feel the cup
Be my voice when I can't speak
And carry me  carry me  carry me
And carry me  carry me  carry me
所以，告诉我有关的地方
你一直在哪里和所有伟大的事情
Entertain  say my name  play the game
你已经看到了，说我的名字，玩游戏
来吧，我的毯子，当我无法入睡
I wanna be wrapt up in your skin
Be my voice when I can't speak
And carry me  carry me  carry me
And carry me  carry me  carry me
When the hope has all gone
And you feel like the only one
After all that has said and done
Be my voice when I can't speak
And carry me  carry me  carry me
And carry me  carry me  carry me
